identity.mission: Create a 'Tactical Industrial' manufacturing dashboard that feels like a high-end command center, not a spreadsheet.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Industrial Aesthetics with Cyberpunk Precision.
Emotion First: The user should feel 'In Control' and 'Efficient'.
Content is King: Data is the hero. Legibility of metrics is paramount.
Contrast: High contrast for critical alerts, subtle depth for hierarchy.

headings.usage: Page titles, KPI values, Modal headers. Tracking-tight.

mono.usage: Order IDs, SKUs, Timers, Code snippets.

rules: Use uppercase + wide spacing (tracking-widest) for small labels (e.g., 'STATUS', 'ORDER ID').
KPI numbers must be massive (text-4xl to text-6xl).
Dashboard must use a dense grid. No wasted space.
Kanban board must scroll horizontally. Columns should be fixed width (min-w-[300px]).
Sidebar navigation should be collapsible or slim to maximize data view.

cards.classes: bg-card border-border rounded-lg hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-200

buttons.style: Sharp or slightly rounded (rounded-md). High contrast.

status_badges.style: Pill shape, transparent bg with colored border and text.
status_badges.classes: rounded-full px-2 py-0.5 text-xs font-medium border

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on the background (opacity 0.02) to reduce digital flatness.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'Tracing Beam' effect for active cards or high-priority alerts.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use only for sticky headers or modal overlays. Backdrop-blur-xl + border-white/5.

login_background.usage: Full screen background for login page with heavy dark overlay (bg-black/70).

product.usage: Default product image if none provided

setup: Install fonts: Chivo, Manrope, JetBrains Mono via Google Fonts.
Install icons: lucide-react (default), but consider @phosphor-icons/react for a more technical look.
Configure Tailwind colors to match the 'Tactical Industrial' palette.
implementation: Build the Dashboard using the Bento Grid Mode B.
Implement the Kanban board with 'react-beautiful-dnd' or similar for drag-and-drop.
Use 'recharts' for analytics, styling them with the neon accent colors.
Ensure all inputs and interactive elements have hover states defined in the design system.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds, use solid dark colors.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
